about-me.headline: Who I Am
about-me.main-text: Hello, with me as a front-end developer, your company will gain a structured, responsible and team-oriented employee. I also have analytical thinking.
about-me.location: I live in Wolfenbüttel, am mobile and also open to working from home.
about-me.mind: The feeling of solving a problem is what motivates me.
about-me.hook: I always dedicate myself to my new tasks and challenges with great motivation and full commitment.

skill-set.headline: Technologies
skill-set.main-text: I have already familiarized myself with several front-end technologies in group and solo projects. My daily required skills include JavaScript, HTML, SCSS, Typscript, Angular and Git.
skill-set.main-text-second: I am happy to learn new skills and familiarize myself with new technologies that you need.
skill-set.speech-bubble: I have a special interest in lerning

projects.headline: Projects
projects.main-text: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
projects.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories
projects.game: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
projects.bubble: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

start.headline: In the beginning
start.text: I started by recoding a Snake game. Instead of starting the next tutorial afterwards, I continued to develop this program on the side for almost a year. According to the motto: “Learn in depth, not in breadth.” I always had to find information by myself.

at-now.headline: At now
at-now.text: At the Developer Akademie, I learned that it is precisely this skill that gets you ahead in programming. In addition, the common thread of this training course allows me to grow quickly in the job-relevant skills, as well as the code reviews of experienced developers.

future.headline: Future
future.text: There are more exciting projects on the agenda in the near future that require skills such as Phyton, Linux and Django. I look forward to expanding my skills and learning new ones in the future. Perhaps with you?

contact.headline: Contact me
contact.question: Got a problem to solve?
contact.main-text: Contact me using the form opposite. I look forward to hearing from you and creating added value in your projects with my work.

name.headline: What's your Name?
name.err: Oops! it seems your name is missing
name.title: Allowed special characters: . - /

message.headline: How can I help you?
message.placeholder: Hey Nicolas, I am interested in...
message.err: What do you need to develop?
message.title: Allowed special characters: , . ! ? # : ; % & € - * + /

form.check-box-end: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
